item.description:
Meetup at MetroRock Gym in Everett. 

Meet UPSTAIRS in the LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA.

I will go up to the Lounge/Workout area from 7 - 7:15 PM to meet people who prefer to show up at the regular MeetUp time. Check this MeetUp's comments and the Whiteboard near the bathrooms for a description of what I'm wearing. If anyone else arrives early, please write "MEETUP" and your name & what you are wearing on the Whiteboard. Seems like traffic is getting heavier (nicer weather, more people out and about), so I cannot guarantee anymore I'll be there around 6 :-(

If you have not already done so, please post a clear face picture of yourself on your profile so that I and other members can recognize you.

If arriving later, just come find us on the walls. Hopefully you can recognize me (see "Event Host" right) from my picture.

Toprope, sport leading, and bouldering available, including some tall walls up to 45 feet. If you'd like to lead climb, don't forget your to bring your rope :)

If you've never climbed here before, you'll need to take & pass a belay test for rope climbing. Call the gym or see the website below for more info. Full-access Day Pass $18. Bouldering-Only Pass $15. Mondays are Women's Night: Women's Day Pass $10. More info and directions: http://www.metrorock.com/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: Meet UPSTAIRS in the LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA; Check this MeetUp's comments and the Whiteboard at the gym for a description of what I'm wearing.
item.name: MetroRock MONDAY, Meeting UPSTAIRS in the Lounge Area, Showing up Early OK
